questions.question: You find yourself in a moonlit meadow, where Lebron James has mysteriously transformed into a majestic goat. His fur glistens as he nuzzles a jar of honey and whispers, ‘Pour it, and unlock the secrets of the hardwood.’ How do you respond?
answers: Drizzle the honey in slow motion while humming the NBA theme song
Ask Lebron for advice on your mid-range jumper before things get stickier
Challenge Lebron to a honey-dunk contest and photoshoot
Cry softly as you realize this is how greatness tastes

questions.question: After clinching Game 7 of the Finals, Lebron invites you to celebrate the victory by choosing one of his teammates to join you for a legendary post-game shower. Who do you pick, and why?
answers: Finals Jason Tatum
Bubble Jamal Murray
COVID Kyrie Irving
Taiwan Dwight Howard

questions.question: After the game, LeBron stands before you, shirtless, sweat glistening like liquid gold. He smiles, leans in close, and whispers, ‘You are my sunshine, my only sunshine.’ The room fills with the scent of victory and cocoa butter. What do you do next?
answers: Offer to massage his calves while reciting poetry about his 2016 Finals performance
Write ‘Property of LeBron’ across your chest in honey and ask for a selfie
Kneel before him, sobbing, as you vow eternal loyalty to his greatness
Ask if he’ll autograph your upper-thigh while singing an a cappella version of ‘Halo’

questions.question: You’re sitting courtside as LeBron transforms through time before your eyes: Miami’s man, Cleveland’s hometown hero, LA’s ageless king, and the high school prodigy. Each version locks eyes with you, and they all whisper, ‘Pick me, baby.’ What happens next?
answers: Bow to the Miami version while begging for forgiveness from the others
Start weeping uncontrollably and whisper, ‘You’re all my sunshine, my only sunshine'
Challenge all four LeBrons to a shirtless, baby-oil dunk contest, but only you keep score
Collapse, overwhelmed by the gravity of his greatness and the scent of pure dominance

questions.question: In a steamy, celestial sauna, LeBron kneels before an angel. This angel, radiating pure judgment, strokes LeBron’s beard and whispers, ‘Confess your greatest sin, Chosen One.’ The room fills with the scent of cocoa butter and unspoken truths. What does LeBron say?
answers: Fall to his knees and scream, ‘I knew the Migos would blow up—I’m a prophet!’
Try to recite a line from The Godfather, but falter and whisper, ‘I can’t.’
Bow to the angel and confess, ‘I said I read Malcolm X… twice, probably.’
Mutter, ‘I didn’t call Kobe’s 81-point game—I just wanted to sound omniscient.’

questions.question: LeBron stands facing you––shirt open, diamonds gleaming, champagne glass in hand. He raises it high, leans in close, and purrs, ‘Ain’t no party like a Diddy party.’ The crowd gasps, the music swells, and the tension is electric. How do you honor his greatness in this moment?
answers: Slip on a mink coat and start feeding him strawberries dipped in molten gold
Dance dramatically around him, chanting, ‘GOAT! GOAT! GOAT!’ until security intervenes
Offer to shine his diamonds while quoting Space Jam 2 lines seductively
Write ‘Diddy’s MVP’ on your chest and demand a photo with him mid-toast

questions.question: Grab the tissues and the lube, because it’s time to relive the greatest LeBron moments. Which masterpiece of basketball dominance sends you over the edge every time you think about it?
answers: 2016 Finals (the whole series): Coming back from 3-1 and making history
Game 6, 2013: The Ray Allen shot that saved LeBron’s legacy
‘The Decision’: Taking his talents to South Beach and changing the NBA forever
‘The Block’: Iguodala denied, immortality achieved
